value:
There are so many amazing
Heroes to be found here. I'll learn
so much from all of them.

Lilina is a great friend of mine, from
way back when we were children.
We studied together in Ostia.

You have my gratitude—you know
that, right? Thanks to you, we
can all fight as one.

Cecilia taught me the art of battle.
I wonder where you got your
great skills, $Nu.

I've been reading a book about this
world's history. Found it right here
in the castle. Fascinating stuff.

Hello there. My name is Roy.
I've come with greetings from
$Nf.
Now that's the spirit!

That's fine, but I'll need to
push myself harder.

I must try to do much better
than that!

Thank you. I'm inexperienced in
many ways. This will help.

My name is Roy. I've come on behalf
of my father, Eliwood of Pherae.
I may be young, but I'll do my best.

I must become as strong as I
can to ensure that I can keep this
and all other good worlds safe.$k$pI want everyone to find their happy
endings in life. But to do that,
there's still much I need to learn.$k$pOn the bright side, I feel that I have
learned so much just by being
near you, $Nu.$k$pI don't mean only about battle tactics
but also about you—where you're
from and what inspires you.$k$pI hope that you and I will forever
be good friends. Know that you
can always depend on me.
はっ！
やぁっ！
うああっ！
I can't lose...
I will win!
There's my opening!
By my blade!
I won't lose. I won't!
Forgive me...
Heehee
Did you need me for something?
You know...if you ever want my attention, just call for me!
I think we can work very well together. Don't you?
I know I can rely on you completely.
For those I must protect...I cannot lose!
I have faith in the goodness of humankind. No matter what.
I'm with you—all the way!
Yes?
Hmm...
Let's go.
For those we must protect—onward!
